newsfeed.content: Field Sampling: CyanoTRACKER team, in collaboration with Florida Atlantic University, will be collecting water samples at Lake Okeechobee
Field Sampling: CyanoTRACKER team, in collaboration with Utah Department of Environment Quality, will be collecting water samples at Lake Utah
Field Sampling: CyanoTRACKER team, in collaboration with Cleveland State University, will be collecting water samples at Lake Erie
Field Sampling: CyanoTRACKER team, in collaboration with Cleveland State University, will be collecting water samples at Green Bay
We will be presenting a paper: "Enhancing CyanoHAB Monitoring Across Multi-Satellite Sensors: Combining Empirical Phycocyanin Algorithms using Machine Learning"
newsfeed.conference: IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium 2024

newsfeed.content: We will be presenting a poster: "Advancing Remote Sensing of CyanoHABs - Phycocyanin Estimation using Hyperspectral Inversion and Machine Learning"
newsfeed.conference: NASA's Biodiversity and Ecological Forecasting Annual Meeting 2024
